snippet: President Vladimir Putin of Russia has much at stake in the Ukraine crisis and is going to have to support negotiations for a peaceful resolution.
abstract: Editorial calls on Russian Pres Vladimir Putin to support peaceful negotiations over Ukraine's future during upcoming meeting with the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe; warns unless Putin takes steps to rein in secessionist movement in southeast Ukraine and pull back his military forces from the border, he risks rapid escalation of violence and international sanctions.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir Putin of Russia has much at stake in the Ukraine crisis and is going to have to support negotiations for a peaceful resolution.

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
keywords.name: organizations
